title: Run FO-05 E2E test until passing
description:
Run the FO-05 E2E test and fix any issues until it passes.

Command to run:
node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts

Prerequisites:
- Dev server running (npm run dev)
- Playwright installed (npm run test:e2e:install)

If tests fail:
1. Read error messages carefully
2. Fix component issues
3. Re-run tests
4. Repeat until all tests pass

Common issues to watch for:
- Timing issues with AI generation (increase timeouts)
- Selector changes for fragment chips vs regular chips
- Continue typing button visibility
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts completes with all tests passing
closed_reason: FO-05 E2E test passed successfully on first run - all fragment input flow, dynamic screens, affirmation generation, and navigation tested
